trans-unit.source: Defines a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et sett med regler for å gi en bruker som er angitt et sett med krav.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IAuthorizationPolicy interface to add or map one set of claims to another.
trans-unit.target: Implementere grensesnittet IAuthorizationPolicy å legge til eller tilordne ett sett med krav til en annen.

trans-unit.source: An authorization policy examines a set of claims and adds additional claims based on the current set.
trans-unit.target: En policy for godkjenning undersøker et sett med krav og legger til flere krav basert på gjeldende sett.

trans-unit.source: For example, an authorization policy might evaluate a claim that contains the date of birth and add a claim that asserts that the user is over 21 years old and add an Over21 claim to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan en policy for godkjenning vurdere et krav som inneholder Fødselsdato og legge til et krav som deklarasjoner at brukeren er over 21 år og legge til en Over21 krav til <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the IAuthorizationPolicy interface do not authorize users, but they enable the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class to do so.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som implementerer grensesnittet IAuthorizationPolicy har godkjent ikke brukere, men de gjør det mulig for <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen for å gjøre so.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method for each authorization policy in effect.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>kall av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>metode for hver authorization-policy for øyeblikket.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method determines whether additional claims should be added for the user, based on the current context.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>metoden bestemmer om ytterligere krav må legges til for brukeren, basert på gjeldende kontekst.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An authorization policy's <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method may be called multiple times, as claims are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> by other authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: En godkjenning policy <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>metoder kan kalles flere ganger i krav er lagt til i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>av andre authorization-policyer.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When all authorization policies in effect are done, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class makes authorization decisions based upon the final set of claims.
trans-unit.target: Når alle authorization-policyer i bruk er ferdig, den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen gjør godkjenning avgjørelsene som er basert på det siste settet med krav.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class then creates an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> that contains an immutable set of claims that reflects these authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen oppretter deretter et <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>som inneholder et uforanderlig sett med krav som gjenspeiler disse godkjenning avgjørelsene.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether a user meets the requirements for this authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om en bruker oppfyller kravene for denne policyen for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Implementers of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> interface should expect the Evaluate method to be called multiple times by different threads.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Implementers av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>grensesnittet skal forventer en Evaluate-metoden til kalles flere ganger av forskjellige tråder.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Implementers of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> interface can use the `state` parameter to track state between calls to the Evaluate method.
trans-unit.target: Implementerere av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>grensesnittet kan bruke den `state` sporer status mellom kallene til metoden Evaluate-parameter.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>

trans-unit.source: If a state object is set inside a given call to the Evaluate method, the same object instance is passed to each and every subsequent call to the Evaluate method in the current evaluation process.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et tilstand-objekt er angitt i et gitt kall til Evaluate-metoden, sendt samme objektforekomsten til hver etterfølgende kall til Evaluate-metoden i den gjeldende evalueringsprosessen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"></xref> that contains the claim set that the authorization policy evaluates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"> </xref> som inneholder et krav som godkjenning policyen evalueres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object>, passed by reference that represents the custom state for this authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>, referert som representerer den egendefinerte tilstanden for denne policyen for godkjenning.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if the Evaluate method for this authorization policy must be called if additional claims are added by other authorization policies to evaluationContext; otherwise, to state no additional evaluation is required by this authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Evaluate-metoden for denne policyen for godkjenning må kalles hvis ytterligere krav er lagt til av andre godkjenning policyer til evaluationContext ; ellers status kreves ingen ekstra evaluering av denne policyen for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Gets a claim set that represents the issuer of the authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: Henter et krav sett som representerer utstederen av policy for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that represents the issuer of the authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> som representerer utstederen av policy for godkjenning.
